attributes.action: stop the merger of Co-op Bank & Britannia Building Society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save 1000's of jobs & stop the creation of another pointless banking giant just because some senior Britannia executives are worried about their pay!

rejection.details: We suggest you raise your concerns with the Competition Commission - http://www.competition-commission.org.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
